text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

translation.en: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise
translation.id: Sungguh, Allah mengetahui apa saja yang mereka sembah selain Dia. Dan Dia Mahaperkasa, Mahabijaksana
